name: SQUARE SKIRMISH
description:
Square Skirmish is a very simple arcade game where you play as a square shooting at other squares and trying to survive for as long as possible!

There are a variety of enemies, ranging from slow but with a lot of HP, to really fast ones but weak. 

The game also features power-ups that can buff some of your stats, so be sure to collect them to give yourself an advantage!

Hope you enjoy this little game! (My first game ever)

Made with Godot Game Engine
